name: Inner Glimmer
description: Inner Glimmer is a 3D platformer game created by Max Levine, Kacie Bryan, and Seth Woodall for Professor Cloninger’s Senior Capstone Project in New Media at the University of North Carolina at Asheville. The game takes place inside the mind, and is about confronting and overcoming internal darkness to fill the mind with light. It is inspired by media such as Inside Out and Psychonauts, as well as the concept of the hero’s journey. We hope that you’ll find it to be a transformative, enlightening, and fun experience.
